rules: Project is a dock clock app using compose multiplatform for android, iOS and desktop
Always do a clean solution not just make it works
Don't write multiple unrelated composable function in the same file
Don't add dependencies to build.gradle directly, add them in libs.versions.toml first

When adding a new shader: 1) Create shader object in shader/ directory 2) Add ShaderType enum value in CustomizationModels.kt 3) Add cases in CustomizationPreviewCard.kt, BackgroundClockView.kt, and CustomizationOptions.kt 4) Add entries in BackgroundRepository.kt for both getBackgroundTypes() and getBackgroundOptions() methods
